Authors and Citation
text: Mowinckel (2026). ggsegKleist: Kleist Atlas 'ggseg' Ecosystem. R package version 2.0.0, https://github.com/ggsegverse/ggsegKleist.

what: Quick instructions for AI coding agents working on ggsegKleist
title: Quick instructions for AI coding agents working on ggsegKleist
text: ggseg 2.0 atlas package providing brain atlas data ggseg ecosystem. data-package custom functions.

title: Quick instructions for AI coding agents working on ggsegKleist
text: data/*.rda – Unified ggseg_atlas objects (2D + 3D one object) R/data.R – Roxygen2 documentation atlas R/ggsegKleist-package.R – Package-level docs, imports ggseg.formats R/sysdata.rda – Internal palette data (brain_pals) data-raw/ – Scripts generated/converted atlas data

title: Quick instructions for AI coding agents working on ggsegKleist
text: package depends ggseg.formats provides ggseg_atlas class. atlas objects work ggseg::geom_brain() (2D) ggseg3d::ggseg3d() (3D).

title: Quick instructions for AI coding agents working on ggsegKleist
text: Update docs: devtools::document() Run tests: devtools::test() (testthat edition 3, describe/style) Full check: devtools::check() Build pkgdown site: pkgdown::build_site()

title: Quick instructions for AI coding agents working on ggsegKleist
text: code comments except necessary workarounds Roxygen2 markdown enabled Tests use describe/BDD style vdiffr visual regression NEWS.md tracks user-facing changes (CI/pkgdown changes) URLs point ggseg GitHub org (LCBC-UiO)

what: Kleist Atlas for the ggseg Ecosystem
title: Kleist Atlas for the ggseg Ecosystem
text: package contains Kleist 1934 historical atlas functional segregation plotting ggseg ggseg3d, based supplementary materials Pijnenburg et al., NeuroImage, 239, 2021 DOI; Version 1; 15-01-2021. Kleist K. (1934) Gehirnpathologie vornehmlich auf Grund der Kriegserfahrungen (Leipzig: Barth). learn use atlases, please look documentation ggseg ggseg3d.

title: Kleist Atlas for the ggseg Ecosystem
Kleist Atlas for the ggseg Ecosystem
code: library(ggsegKleist) library(ggseg) library(ggplot2)  ggplot() +   geom_brain(     atlas = kleist(),     mapping = aes(fill = label),     position = position_brain(hemi ~ view),     show.legend = FALSE   ) +   scale_fill_manual(values = kleist()$palette, na.value = "grey") +   theme_void()

title: Kleist Atlas for the ggseg Ecosystem
text: Please note ‘ggsegKleist’ project released Contributor Code Conduct. contributing project, agree abide terms.
code: library(ggseg3d)  ggseg3d(atlas = kleist()) |>   add_glassbrain() |>   pan_camera("right lateral")

what: ggsegKleist: Kleist Atlas for the 'ggseg' Ecosystem — ggsegKleist-package
title: ggsegKleist: Kleist Atlas for the 'ggseg' Ecosystem — ggsegKleist-package
text: Historical Kleist functional segregation atlas 'ggseg' ecosystem. Provides unified 'ggseg_atlas' object 2D polygon geometry 3D vertex indices, use 'ggseg' 'ggseg3d'.

title: ggsegKleist: Kleist Atlas for the 'ggseg' Ecosystem — ggsegKleist-package
Kleist Atlas — kleist
text: Brain atlas historical Kleist 1934 functional segregation 49 regions per hemisphere. Contains 2D polygon geometry ggseg::geom_brain() 3D vertex indices ggseg3d::ggseg3d().

title: ggsegKleist 2.0.0
text: kleist now ggseg_atlas object (ggseg.formats) containing 2D 3D data. separate kleist_3d object removed. Atlas recreated scratch using ggsegExtra::create_cortical_atlas() kleist annotation fsaverage5. Use ggplot() + ggseg::geom_brain(atlas = kleist) 2D plots ggseg3d::ggseg3d(atlas = kleist) 3D plots – object. ggseg.formats now hard dependency (Depends). Package URLs updated LCBC-UiO ggseg GitHub organisation.
